A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It is a visually striking movie but that doesn’t save it. TLJ Luke is not original trilogy Luke. Horribly wasted character in TLJ. The new main characters minus Kylo and Rey\, who seems to be the only useful and likable one\, are reckless and dangerous. They make Jar Jar Binks look competent. At least in his buffoonery he was able to take out some droids. The story is messy and often nonsensical\, rehashing scenes from previous movies. TLJ was so disappointing that it made me\, a Star Wars fan\, lose interest in Star Wars.
